Ekadussadāyaka Thera：An arahant．In the time of Padumuttara Buddha be was a grass-cutter of Hamsavatī and gave to the Buddha his only upper garment．As a result he reigned in heaven thirty-six times and was king of men thirty-three times．

He had the power of obtaining garments at will wherever he happened to be．Ap.ii.379f.
